# Correlation Matrix

```{r}
library(foreign)

setwd("C:/Users/orcas/Documents/GitHub/dissertation/")
grid <- read.dbf("Aus_grid.dbf")
```

```{r fig.height=10}
library(corrplot)

corrplot(cor(grid[c(2:8,97:98,96,12,95,10:11,13:15,99,16,90:93,17)]), method="number", type="lower")
```
